steps.p: We are speeding on a highway to CO₂ hell…
… and we need to slow down. because it's already too late.
The more CO₂ the more heat gets trapped, the hotter our planet gets - and this isn't good.
Human activity has been increasing the amount of CO₂ in the atmosphere, mostly since the industrial revolution in the early 1800s and...
… we are pouring more out and faster than ever before.
By current estimates, we have emitted about 2,200 gigatonnes of CO₂ in the atmosphere.
That means, we are already at almost 1ºC of global warming which is already super bad for our planet.
Where has all that CO₂ come from? We have been counting since 1990:
Although, no matter how you count it and divide it, what we have emitted remains emitted.
At the current speed of increase, global warming will reach 1.5 ºC by 2040
We need to slow this down. There is something we can do, now it's your turn to take action.
